title: Back By Popular Demand: Courtyard Boston Danvers Encourages Adventure And Fun With Whale Watching Package
text:
Reprint DANVERS, Mass. , July 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Once again giving Boston visitors an opportunity to view nature's gentle giants in an up-close and personal way, Boston Courtyard Danvers has brought back a special hotel package through the end of October. With the Boston Summer Whale Watch Experience Package , guests will enjoy tickets for two to see the beautiful ocean creatures as well as overnight accommodations from $219 to $309 per night. The deal allows guests to experience a satisfying stay at a New England colonial-style hotel before creating amazing memories on their off-shore adventure. Named "The Best for Whale Watching" by Boston Magazine's New England Travel Guide, Cape Ann Whale Watch in Gloucester guarantees whale sightings for every tour. Lasting three to four hours, the ride on the elegant vessel provides a breathtaking experience for visitors of all ages. Stellwagen Bank, a national marine preserve about 12 miles off of the coast of Gloucester, MA , has been deemed one of the "Top 5 Whale Watching Destinations in the World" by the World Wildlife Fund due to the wide variety of species that migrate to its coast every year to feed on the abundant natural resources. After an eventful day of sightseeing and picture taking, visitors will enjoy winding down at The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. , the convenient restaurant at the Danvers hotel. Serving a variety of breakfast foods, salads, sandwiches and specialty cocktails and Starbucks beverages, the inviting atmosphere is perfect for family gatherings and leisurely meals for breakfast and dinner. Spacious guest rooms at the hotel in Danvers offer complimentary high-speed Internet access for vacationers wanting to kick back and relax after a fun adventure or share pictures from the day's whale watching expedition. Luxury bedding featuring cotton-rich linens and fluffy pillows ensure a peaceful retreat. Additional amenities include LCD HDTVs, coffee makers and hair dryers. To take advantage of the Danvers hotel's Boston Summer Whale Watch Experience Package, valid Thursday through Sunday through Oct. 31, 2015 , visitors must use the promotional code ES7 when booking online or calling 1-800-228-9290. About Courtyard Boston Danvers Courtyard Boston Danvers at 275 Independence Way in Danvers, MA , is near Liberty Tree Mall, the North Shore Mall and historic Salem . The perfect choice when visiting the North Shore, the New England colonial-style hotel consists of 3 floors featuring 118 rooms, 2 suites, 2 meeting rooms with 1,000 square feet of flexible event space, a fitness center and an outdoor pool. The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. is open for breakfast and dinner. Additional amenities include a 24-hour market, complimentary wireless Internet access and a GoBoard, featuring weather and airport conditions. For information, visit www.DanversCourtyard.com or call 1- 978-777-8630.
